summary: This document is a Fourth Amendment to the Restated Trust of Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing changes to the trustees of the trust. It specifies the removal of Henry Jarecki as a successor co-Trustee and the designation of Darren K. Indyke, Joseph Pagano, and Lawrence Newman as successor co-Trustees. The amendment was executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in 2007.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Grantor of the trust and is executing the Fourth Amendment to the Restated Trust.

persons.name: Henry Jarecki
persons.context: Henry Jarecki is being removed as a successor co-Trustee of the trust.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is designated as a successor co-Trustee in place of Henry Jarecki.

persons.name: Joseph Pagano
persons.context: Joseph Pagano is designated as a successor co-Trustee in place of Henry Jarecki.

persons.name: Lawrence Newman
persons.context: Lawrence Newman is designated as a successor co-Trustee in place of Henry Jarecki.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is removing Henry Jarecki from his position as a successor co-Trustee of the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is designating Darren K. Indyke as a successor co-Trustee of the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is designating Joseph Pagano as a successor co-Trustee of the trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is designating Lawrence Newman as a successor co-Trustee of the trust.

events.title: Fourth Amendment to the Restated Trust
events.description: The Fourth Amendment to the Restated Trust was executed, removing Henry Jarecki as a successor co-Trustee and designating three new co-Trustees.

keyFacts: The document is a Fourth Amendment to the Restated Trust of Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Henry Jarecki was removed as a successor co-Trustee.
Darren K. Indyke, Joseph Pagano, and Lawrence Newman were designated as successor co-Trustees.
The amendment was executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in 2007.
The document includes a notarization by Uren J. Kwintner.
